segments.text: I'm just watching this whole mess unfold, and it's quite something.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The sheer waste of water is what really gets to me.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Just running and running, down the cabinets, onto the floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's such a preventable disaster, if only someone were paying attention.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman seems utterly lost in her dish-drying trance.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her complete lack of awareness is almost unbelievable.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: And then there are the children, plotting their cookie raid.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's a classic case of domestic negligence and childhood opportunism.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This kitchen is going to be a disaster area very soon.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Water damage, maybe a fall, broken dishes, a sugar rush.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It paints a rather grim picture of household management.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I suppose it's a realistic glimpse into the chaos of everyday life.
segments.speaker: PAR
